Dedicated to all combatants of WWII: Lest we forget - we are all first and foremost humans.

Lest we forget: Attack on Pearl Harbor

  • By Artem V. Shamsutdinov
  • December 7th, 2024
    Amended: June 22nd, 2025

Today is the 83rd anniversary of the attack on Pearl Harbor. In a surprise attack Imperial Japan attacked the United States Pacific Fleet at its naval base on Oahu, Hawaii. This led to the entry of the United States into World War II. Lest we forget.
